tasks.instruction: Read and analyze the uploaded F1 documentation file at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md and the AWS F1 page at https://aws.amazon.com/sports/f1/. Create a comprehensive Product Research Document that includes: 1) Analysis of existing F1 data and capabilities, 2) AWS F1 features analysis (Race Strategy, Competitor Analysis, Car Performance), 3) Feature requirements for our own implementation, 4) Competitive analysis comparing AWS approach vs our approach, 5) Market research on F1 analytics applications. Save the output to /workspace/docs/prd/f1_analytics_prd.md

Based on the PRD at /workspace/docs/prd/f1_analytics_prd.md and the original documentation at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md, design a complete system architecture for the F1 Real-Time Analytics Engine. Include: 1) Overall system architecture diagram, 2) Component design for Race Strategy module, 3) Component design for Competitor Analysis module, 4) Component design for Car Performance module, 5) Data flow architecture, 6) Technology stack recommendations, 7) Integration points with existing F1 data sources. Save the system design to /workspace/docs/design/f1_system_design.md

Based on the system design at /workspace/docs/design/f1_system_design.md and original documentation at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md, perform detailed data analysis and create implementation specifications: 1) Analyze existing F1 data structure and capabilities, 2) Design data models for Race Strategy analytics, 3) Design data models for Competitor Analysis, 4) Design data models for Car Performance tracking, 5) Create sample data processing pipelines with code examples, 6) Provide statistical analysis methods for each module, 7) Create data visualization recommendations. Save all outputs to /workspace/docs/analysis/f1_data_analysis.md

Synthesize all previous work from /workspace/docs/prd/f1_analytics_prd.md, /workspace/docs/design/f1_system_design.md, and /workspace/docs/analysis/f1_data_analysis.md into a comprehensive research document and development roadmap. Include: 1) Executive summary of the F1 Analytics Engine project, 2) Complete feature breakdown inspired by AWS F1 capabilities, 3) Detailed implementation roadmap with phases, 4) Sample code examples for each major module (Race Strategy, Competitor Analysis, Car Performance), 5) Technical architecture details, 6) Data integration strategies, 7) Deployment and scaling recommendations. Save the final comprehensive document to /workspace/docs/research/f1_complete_research_roadmap.md
